document.full_text: the west's energy watchdog urged oil producers to boost supply to cut fuel costs, to protect economic recovery, and appeared to suggest its members could release emergency stockpiles if opec does not act.
document.title: west's oil agency urges opec: pump more, or else
lines_and_colors: the west's energy watchdog urged oil producers to boost supply to cut fuel costs, to protect economic recovery, and appeared to suggest its members could release emergency stockpiles if opec does not act.
